name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Oppwiser - Find Your Next ICP with One Click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Open any website and find its competitors:
Go to a website that belongs to your ICP or an existing client, open Oppwiser extension and find more companies that are similar. If both businesses do the same thing and one of them is your ICP or even a client, chances are that the other one will be interested in your products or services too.

Open any website and find key decision-makers:
Go to a website of your potential ICP or customer, load our extension and we will show the key decision-maker at that company, as well as their contact data.

Go to Linkedin company profile and find similar companies - working in the same industry, selling the same products or services. We will also suggest key decision-makers at that company and provide their contact data - business emails and phone numbers.

To access these features, first signup for free account at https://oppwiser.com
